reviews.review:
Counter-Strike source (resuminho da wikipedia hiihi) 

Counter-Strike: Source (abreviado como CS:S) é um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa, da série Counter-Strike lançado em 2004 pela Valve Software,com a engine do Half-Life 2 isso todo mundo sabe e bla bla (vc ta na steam vc devia saber da engine e coisas relacionadas a valve essa empresa maravi-linda)

nao tem muito pros e contras,nesse jogo lindo:jogo de tiro e sem historia (ou tem .-.)(terrorista vs soldados e tals) 

coisas interessantes:dar pra usar skins ('-')   e modos de jogo como Jail e  Deathrun (que sinceramente nunca vi por PTB ser vida)

jogabilidade:boa pra caralh* igual a todos os jogos da valve (infelizmente eu nao manjo muito de ak e m16 por sempre jogar com awp :v,mais eu digo que e bom por varios elogios de outros players,e tambem eu nao manjo dos parkour, resumo,sou um inutil)

ta um pouco tarde de fazer analise do CS:S,porque varios outros players estao indo por CS:GO (o legal de tudo e que os servidores do cs:s nao estao abandonados,estao sempre cheio,e nao tem cheater,os cara que manja pra carai la,eu nao sou um deles ;-;)

entao,queria fazer essa analise pra falar desse jogo que marcou minha pre-adolescencia.

eu sofria (sofro ainda :v)bully na escola,e esse game sempre me salvou,de chorar e me matar .-.

tipo uma vez que fizeram uma votaçao de quem e era o mais feio da sala e eu infelizmente ou felizmente nao ganhei (nem isso eu ganho ;-;)fiquei em 2 lugar,o 1 foi o proprio amigo delas .-.,(eram meninas)naquele dia fiquei sem motivo pra viver,fiquei perdido e angustiado,cheguei chorando em casa,fui por meu quarto,olhei por pc vi o CS:S e falei ''pra que chorar?''e fui jogar,o meu CS:S era pirateado entao eu jogava so com bot com fps entre 15 e 20,bons tempos (ou nao).
conclusao de tudo,tirando warface.

EU AMO ESSE GAME.

Прекрасная CS на слабейший компьютер, если у вас комп днищенский, то эта игра для вас, и для меня. Много серверов: 1)фановые серверы, типа игры против зомби, при чем вы тоже можете им стать и догонять остальных выживших 2)простые сервера для обычной игры на даст, ньюк и т.д. Вот только мне кажется, что цена слегка завышенна, а так все норм!!!
Go into a boomer run CS server, in 10 mins get top of score board. Got perma banned for being too good. Literally nothing else. That's all this game is now, people afraid of the ever march of time.
It's a good game but some players are trash.

Almost 600 Hours of pure pleasure !
 None of that CSGO Cancerous community.
Ótimo jogo para quem quer relembrar os bons tempos, recomendo muito!
this games is one of the best games ive played and i play allot of games you should buy it 100%
Bastante bueno,lastima que ya no hay tanta comunidad.
Круто спомнить 2004 год ну Игра как CS:GO
Personally this game i think is better then CSGO
En su epoca era lo mejor pero les recomiendo comprarse el csgo que esta mas barato :v
Nostalgy comes in when i play this classic shooter

It may be a dead game (if you're new to cs, you're kinda screwed), but it still has a great feel to it. If you play CS:GO and you haven't played this, you're missing out on a great game. If you have no friends to play with, then it might be a bit boring. Overall, this game is a hidden gem (maybe not so hidden) that has many redeeming qualities about it. Unfortunately, less and less people are playing it and servers that need money to stay running are dying. But at least its death will not come for some time.

I'm a bad reviewer, lol
Достаточно хорошая игра для такой низкой цен, но лучше накопите на Global offensiv
i can only play the full verison for a limnted time dont buy this S##T game!
Pues es un buen juego al igual que el csgo obvio que el cs es mejor pero tambien cuenta FPS
ТОП игруля, всем советую купить поиграть
this game is good but the bot are too easy if you u have played on cs:go
This is a great action game. Gives a very good FPS for medium PC's.
Awesome game just like Global Offensive.. Matchmaking is only missing

This game is like CS 1.6 but using the Source™ Engine, maps were revamped and guns are beast
CS:S is a very good FPS game to enjoy
Fantastic game and a blast from the past to play today,Still holds up well 100%
You either play this and act like a pro, or just got it for GMod
Even on easy, the bots are vicious compared to the bots in CSGO. Besides that, there is nothing special about it besides the game itself, which is great! Plus this helped a lot with gmod.

No knife skins, no lootboxes, no stupid garbage; just amazing gameplay and fun.

It was one of the first games I ever owned on Steam and I still play it to this day multiple times a week. I can even run it on my class laptop when I'm on break or when I have nothing to do.
游戏很好玩，延续了CS1.6的经典。BOT确实强，认真打才能拿第一。但我想知道到底怎么跟好友一起玩(๑•ᴗ•๑)
Игра хорошая,графон для того времени идеальны хоть и выпущена в 2004 (простите если ошибаюсь).Звук хороший только цена 400 рублей,что довольно не выгодно(
Better than CSGO i can give you dat
Not as good as CS 1.6 or CS GO but still a pretty fun game to mess around with from time to time.
Fajna lekko zestarzała gra, ale swoją klase trzyma <3 :D
Ого а тут попадать в голову гораздо лечге какототя вошеле пооому что пмцца азюадк

Un juegazo prro :v
A laik des :v

Eñañoweeee :v
Много оружия. Есть несколько скинов для разной команды. Серверов тоже много это ещё Один плюс. А из плохого только то что очень мало карт
Ive had many great experiences with this game and i can say from personal experience that this title is very addictive, You can make friends and have good times.
补票，纪念当年在社区娱乐服的激♂情
fun game, but its filled with old boomers who yell at you :(
Эх те былые времена, когда я играл на jail сервере. А ведь мне тогда было всего 13 лет. Эхх славные были деньки.
